summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the behavior of response handling utilities in the Moto library, covering gzip compression of response bodies, JSON request body flattening, extraction of query parameters, Jinja template rendering, Unicode handling in query strings, and preservation of response metadata and environment.
business_intent: Ensure that the mock AWS service responses provided by Moto correctly implement compression, parameter parsing, rendering, and metadata handling so that applications relying on these mocks can be tested reliably.
